main event: An observer reported a stationary glowing object above tall trees in Port Washington, New York on November 3, 1966. The object was not shaped like an aircraft.
interesting points: The object exhibited a distinct whitish luminescent glow., The observer estimated the object was 800-1000 feet above the ground., The object was seen for several minutes and was not observed traveling., Two reliable witnesses had a similar report of sightings on October 18, 1966 with objects described as oval-shaped., The objects observed previously were reported to be moving at a high rate of speed.
witness description: One was a retired naval officer and the other a retired businessman.
